text: Nossa Senhora das Dores is Portuguese for Our Lady of Sorrows, a title of Mary. It may also refer to the following places, named in her honor : == Brazil == * Nossa Senhora das Dores, Santa Maria * Nossa Senhora das Dores, Sergipe == Cape Verde== * Nossa Senhora das Dores (Sal), the sole freguesia (civil parish) of Sal, Cape Verde (municipality), which also covers the whole island. == See also == * Senhora das Dores Church
title: Nossa Senhora das Dores
